description:
Yuuri has gotten used to living with Lilith, but he’s still suspicious of her. One day, he spots her leaving the building seeming somewhat anxious.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Bocchama to Neko to Asagao to
Le maître, le chat et les liserons
The Young Master, the Cat, and the Morning Glory
السيد الصغير، والقطة، وزهرة بهاء الصباح
坊ちゃまと猫と朝顔と
